scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a group of men gathered around a central figure, identified as Christ by his halo. A kneeling figure, possibly a woman, reaches out towards Christ. Behind Christ, a building with a tower and arched windows is visible. The figures are rendered in a woodcut style, with strong lines and hatching to indicate form and shadow. The overall composition is framed by an arched border.
scene_interpretation: Healing of the Woman with an Issue of Blood
